title: S4 Ep40: Using AI to target aid in Togo
itunes:title: Using AI to target aid in Togo
description: There is often an urgent need for humanitarian assistance in low-income countries. But how can it be targeted efficiently and quickly? Joshua Blumenstock tells Tim Phillips how, in Togo, a combination of machine learning and mobile phone data dramatically increased the effectiveness of Covid assistance.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
